entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
